Haleef Haleef Haleef

Strategic B2B Events Partner in the Middle East & Africa

Welcome to Haleef, your trusted partner in delivering high-impact B2B conferences, summits, and business events across the Middle East and Africa

Explore Upcoming Events >
Linkedin X-twitter Facebook Instagram Youtube

About Haleef -Your Ally in Business Events and Strategic Networking

Launched in 2025, Haleef stands for “Ally” or “Companion” in Arabic - reflecting our mission to build strong, purpose-driven partnerships through professional events. With over 30 years of combined industry experience, our team brings proven expertise in organizing impactful B2B events tailored for markets in the Middle East and Africa. We create curated knowledge-sharing platforms that empower business leaders, institutions, and decision-makers to stay ahead in rapidly evolving industries.

From concept to execution, Haleef delivers results-driven event experiences that inform, engage, and inspire.

Vision & Mission

Our Commitment to Purpose, Progress, and Partnership

Vision

To become the leading partner for business transformation through expertly curated B2B knowledge platforms across emerging markets in the Middle East and Africa

Mission

🔹 Deliver premium B2B events that drive measurable business outcomes
🔹 Connect industry leaders, innovators, and ideas to accelerate growth
🔹 Champion insight-led content, strategic collaboration, and real value
🔹 Build lasting partnerships with clients, stakeholders, and regional ecosystems

Our Services - Curated B2B Platforms
That Drive Industry Growth

At Haleef, we create insight-driven business experiences tailored to the needs of high-growth sectors across the Middle East and Africa. Our platforms are designed for relevance, precision, and impact-connecting decision-makers, thought leaders, and industry stakeholders with the knowledge, networks, and opportunities that matter.

Learn more

& Summits

Industry-focused events that inspire innovation and shape business agendas.

Roundtables

Bespoke Awards Ceremonies

Recognizing excellence in leadership, innovation, and corporate integrity.

1-to-1 Business Meetings

Curated matchmaking experiences that deliver measurable ROI.

Workshops & Masterclasses

Expert-led learning sessions designed to build actionable skills.

White-Label Events

Custom event production solutions aligned with your brand goals.
